managment

Class EmployerRecordController

  • java.lang.Object
    • managment.EmployerRecordController

  • public class EmployerRecordController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class recives data from MyEmployersController, its purpose is to set each employer to it's correct accordion(users that need to be approved to waiting_for_approval_accordion) users that have been approved to the approved_accordion we do this by setting the employers address and telephone and loading this MyEmployersRecord FXML file into My EmployerScreen FXML
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    matan weisberg

      • setData

        public void setData(Employer emp,
                    MyListener approveEmployer)
        setter function to set emp, approveEmployer , the classes labels
        Parameters:
        emp - an employee from MyEmployersContoler we use the employe to set label details
        approveEmployer - a listener from EmployerController that is set to approves the employer in database

      • setApproval

        public void setApproval(javafx.scene.control.Accordion waiting_for_approval_accordion,
                        javafx.scene.control.Accordion approved_accordion,
                        javafx.scene.control.TitledPane pane)
        function used to approve the Employer, we move the employer to the correct accordion accordion to if it's been approved.
        Parameters:
        waiting_for_approval_accordion - accordion we remove the employer from
        approved_accordion - acoordion we move the used to once he is approved
        pane - Pane we remove from waiting_for_approval and move to approved_accordion
